Package model

Class PlayerStats

java.lang.Object
model.PlayerStats
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<PlayerStats>, PlayerStatsInterface
public class PlayerStats extends Object implements PlayerStatsInterface, Serializable, Comparable<PlayerStats>
This class represents the statistics of a player. It implements Serializable for object serialization, PlayerStatsInterface for defining player statistics operations, and Comparable for comparing player statistics.
See Also:
